name: Cactus Farm Deluxe
description:
My entry for the Low Effort Jam 6!

The Ultimate Cactus Simulator! This is a clicker-style game in which you grow a cactus. Use photosynthesis to get energy, grow branches to improve energy production and get taller! Your objective is to reach 1m height.
Known bugs:

  • Restart button doesn't work
  • Button text disappears randomly

Made with:

  • Unity
  • Inkscape
  • https://www.makewordart.com/
